name: Cherry Picker
author: CherryPicker Team

sections.description:
Cherry Picker is a plugin that allows sellers to add products from various online stores to their websites in just one click. It generates a bookmarklet (a miniature JavaScript application) that you Drag & Drop to the browser bookmarks bar. Clicking on the bookmark while you are on a product page of AliExpress, Amazon, Xiaomi-Mi.com, www.gearbest.com, next.co.uk, poshmark.com, or iHerb will automatically add the product to your WooCommerce website. Cherry Picker will import all the product details, including the title, price, description, category, images gallery, thus saving you hours of content work. Here you can find a step-by-step guide on how to create custom content grabbers for Cherry Picker.

Support and feature requests

Looking for a way to extend a list of supported websites? Visit https://cherrypicker.shop/ to get our premium support.

Something is missing or got a technical problem? Please use the Link support forum.
sections.installation:
Cherry picker creates a custom admin menu where you can get your bookmarklet and manage the basic settings.

  • Activate the plugin
  • Go to Cherry Picker
  • Drag & Drop the bookmarklet to the bookmarks bar
  • Set a default product status (public or draft)
  • You are ready to go
sections.faq:
What online stores does Cherry Picker currently support?

AliExpress, Amazon, Xiaomi-Mi, and iHerb. More online stores are on the way.

Some product fields are not imported

For non-standard product pages (e.g. amazon special deals) some fields might not be available.

Does Cherry Picker support variable products

Not yet. Currently we support only simple products.
